root.name: Pinball Construction Set
root.description: Background After creating Raster Blaster Budge's preference for coding and developing graphics routines – over and above game design itself – led him to create a tool set that people could use to create their own levels.Industry InfluenceOther luminaries of game development have credited Budge and Pinball Construction Set with influencing their own Do-It-Yourself centric designs, including SimCity's Will Wright, and LittleBigPlanet's David Smith.
